name: Article 1, § 1, point 2, sous-point a; Règlement (UE) 2021/2115; Article 13, § 1, alinéa 2 - Am 4
title: Common Agricultural Policy (CAP): good agricultural and environmental condition standards, schemes for climate, environment and animal welfare, amendments to CAP Strategic Plans, review of CAP Strategic Plans and exemptions from controls and penalties
